page.title: 09THE THRILL OF ALTON TOWERS
page.content: Thrills! Fears!Spine-chilling rides and activities, all at Alton Towers! Loop- the-loop:travel at 50mph on the Black Hole;ride the white waters of the Log- Flume;get dizzy on the Waveswinger and scream on the Pirate Ship. Ride a gondola and see the world in "Round the World in 80 Days";gasp at the breath-taking, fantastic coloured fountains and enjoy the fascinating DollÂ£s Exhibition and museum of toys. Wander through the Towers themselves and climb to the top for the breath- taking views of the surrounding country -side;ride in a cable-car or miniature railway to enjoy wonderful views of the landscaped valley gardens from the top of the Chinese Temple.Stroll through the rock gardens and admire the fount- ains. Toddlers play happily in Advent- ureland.All this and much more at Alton Towers.
